interface.name: dde_security
interface.description: A global protocol provide security protection.

request.name: get_session
request.description: Create a security session. Values for types argument are described by dde_security.types.

request.name: get_ace_clients
request.description: get all ace client pid. Values for pid argument is the pid of the client caller

event.name: ace_clients
event.description: The event will be sent after get the ace pids.

interface.name: security_session
interface.description: An interface that provide the security user interface. It provides requests to report verify result.

request.name: report_security
request.description: Report security verify result. Values for types argument are described by dde_security.types. Values for result argument are described by dde_security.permissions.

event.name: verify_security
event.description: This event will be sent to client verifing security. Values for types argument are described by dde_security.types.

arg.name: serial
arg.summary: pass this to the report request
